entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 04:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
